13fcf47d-461e-46c4-9ebe-02d033e545c8.fee_structure: In the amount of [Payment Terms] according to [Payment Schedule]
13fcf47d-461e-46c4-9ebe-02d033e545c8.full_text_context:
SAMPLE AGREEMENT 
This Agreement (“Agreement”) is made and entered into as of [Date], by and between [Party A 
Name], located at [Address] (“Party A”), and [Party B Name], located at [Address] (“Party B”). 
1. Purpose​
 Party A and Party B agree to enter into this Agreement for the purpose of outlining the basic 
terms under which Party A will provide certain services to Party B. The parties intend for this 
document to serve as a clear statement of expectations and responsibilities. 
2. Services​
 Party A agrees to perform the following services for Party B: [Description of Services]. Party 
A will complete the services in a professional manner and within reasonable timelines discussed 
between the parties. 
3. Compensation​
 In exchange for the services described above, Party B agrees to compensate Party A in the 
amount of [Payment Terms]. Payment will be made according to the following schedule: 
[Payment Schedule]. 
4. Term and Termination​
 This Agreement will begin on the date stated above and will continue until the services are 
completed, unless terminated earlier by either party upon written notice. Either party may 
terminate this Agreement for any reason by providing [Number of Days] days written notice. 
5. Confidentiality​
 Both parties agree to keep confidential any nonpublic information received during the course of 
this Agreement, except when disclosure is required by law. 
6. Liability​
 Party A will not be liable for any indirect or consequential damages. Liability for direct damages 
is limited to the amount paid under this Agreement. 
7. Entire Agreement​
 This document constitutes the entire agreement between the parties regarding the subject 
matter. Any amendments must be made in writing and signed by both parties. 
8. Governing Law​
 This Agreement will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of 
[State/Country]. 
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date written 
above. 
 
Party A 
 
Party B

clauses.text: Neither party will be liable for any failure or delay in performance due to events beyond their reasonable control.

clauses.text: Neither party shall be liable for any failure or delay in performance due to events.

299fd91d-5dc1-486d-acac-033a3b79c38a.doc_name: AlphaCore Technologies and NeuroGrid Analytics Non-Disclosure Agreement
299fd91d-5dc1-486d-acac-033a3b79c38a.full_text_context:
FULL LEGAL DOCUMENT TEXT 
NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT 
This Non-Disclosure Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into on 18 March 2025 (“Effective 
Date”) between AlphaCore Technologies Ltd (“Party A”) and NeuroGrid Analytics Pvt Ltd (“Party 
B”) for the purpose of exploring a potential strategic partnership. 
1.​ Definition of Confidential Information​
 Confidential Information refers to all nonpublic technical, financial, operational, or 
business data disclosed by either party in written, oral, visual, or electronic form. 
Confidential Information also includes analyses, compilations, notes, and all other 
materials derived from such data.​
 
2.​ Obligations of Confidentiality​
 Each party agrees to protect the Confidential Information of the other party with the 
same degree of care it applies to its own sensitive information. Neither party will disclose 
Confidential Information to any third party except to employees or advisors who have a 
need to know and are bound by similar confidentiality obligations.​
 
3.​ Permitted Use​
 Confidential Information may be used solely for evaluating or pursuing the proposed 
strategic partnership. It may not be used for competitive purposes, commercial 
exploitation, or any activity not expressly authorized under this Agreement.​
 
4.​ Exclusions​
 Confidential Information does not include information that becomes public through no 
fault of the receiving party, was already in the receiving party’s possession prior to 
disclosure, is independently developed without reference to the Confidential Information, 
or is disclosed under a legal or regulatory requirement.​
 
5.​ Term and Termination​
 This Agreement remains in effect for three years from the Effective Date. Either party 
may terminate the Agreement upon ninety days’ written notice. Upon termination, all 
Confidential Information must be returned or destroyed within ten business days.​
 
6.​ Survival​
 All confidentiality obligations shall survive termination of this Agreement for a period of 
three years.​
 
7.​ No License​
 Nothing in this Agreement grants any license or rights to the receiving party under any 
patents, copyrights, trademarks, or other intellectual property of the disclosing party.​
 
8.​ Governing Law​
 This Agreement is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any 
disputes arising under this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the 
courts located in Bengaluru, India.
